listing.listing_description:
Baan Santisuk is an enchanting villa in Kamala on the island of Phuket. Situated within walking distance of Kamala Beach, the villa features panoramic ocean views from its ample outdoor living areas, along with exquisite interiors and five superb bedroom suites, all with furnished outdoor spaces and ocean views. Blending beautiful traditional style with high-end contemporary design, this luxury vacation rental provides a unique yet consummate experience of coastal Thailand.

The estate is perched on a hillside amid lush gardens, providing an utterly serene and private setting to gather with family or entertain guests. Two exquisite salas—one large and bi-level, one small—stand beside the infinite swimming pool. Savor delightful days in the South Pacific sun, floating in the pool's crystalline waters, relaxing on elegant sun loungers, and beholding spectacular vistas of the verdant shoreline and turquoise sea. Enjoy afternoons in the small pavilion, sipping cool cocktails in the lavish lounge. At sunset, gaze on the sublime views from the rooftop terrace.

The main sala features an ample lounge and beautiful dining table just beside the pool, with open walls allowing a lovely flow of space and air. The upper level includes another lounge and dining area, with privileged views of the sea below. Your private chef will prepare delectable Thai feasts in the fully equipped kitchen, paired with a fine wine from the fridge or cocktails mixed at the wet bar. At night, cuddle with your favorite movies in the outstanding entertainment room with large screen projector and sound system. Refresh your body in the morning in the well-appointed fitness room.

The villa features five extraordinary bedroom suites, four with one double bed each, and one with two twin beds. All have ensuite bathrooms, three with alfresco showers, while the master suite enjoys an alfresco tub as well. Four of the suites have balconies, while one opens to the pool terrace. Floor-to-ceiling glass walls provide each room with beautiful ocean views and a dreamy breeze. With accommodations for ten, the villa is ideal for families and destination wedding guests.

Baan Santisuk enjoys one of the finest locations on Phuket. Less than a kilometer to Kamala Beach, you're just minutes by car from Surin Beach, Patong Beach, and the nightlife of downtown Patong.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Built within the Samujana Estate, this Koh Samui vacation home is surrounded by tropical gardens and designed to optimize ocean views. With accommodations for eight, this luxury villa is the perfect setting for a beach holiday with the family, or a golf vacation with friends.

Decorated with a neutral scheme, this tropical villa is tranquil and relaxing. The earthy tones of local wood and stone compliment the vibrant colors of lush vegetation throughout the property. Easy flow from the terrace to the interior ensures that nature is always enjoyed, and appreciated within. Comfortable designer furniture, positioned thoughtfully throughout the open concept floor plan, is used to separate spaces with out sacrificing ease of flow. As a result, the atmosphere promotes socializing, while maintaining the ability for guest to find privacy when it is desired.

Some of the more private areas in Sixteen are the games room, home cinema, and study, all great places to relax and watch a movie, or challenge a friend to a game of billiards. The kitchen comes equipped with a breakfast bar, espresso machine, and a wine fridge. And, if you’re thinking of hosting a dinner party, there’s space for ten at the formal dining area inside, and room for the same out on the terrace. Also on the terrace, you’ll find sun beds, loungers, living spaces, and even a yoga deck, all surrounding the infinity pool. And, included with rental is airport transfer, daily housekeeping, and breakfast.

Three of the four bedrooms features king beds, lounge areas, private access to the terrace, and ensuite bathrooms with rain showers, bathtubs, and bidets. The fourth bedroom, great for kids, has all of those features as well, but instead of a king bed, it has two twin beds.

Nearby the villa you’ll find Choeng Mon and Chaweng Beaches, the Koh Samui Rain Forest, and shopping, dining, and nightlife on Koh Samui’s Main Street. And, if you feel like a challenge, book a round at Bohput Hills Championship Golf Course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A harmonious balance of inside and outside living, beachfront Villa Tievoli has been designed with absolute luxury in mind. A spacious living area is equally suited to both entertaining and ultimate relaxation, while the gardens merge seamlessly with the golden shoreline. Take the day trip of a lifetime to the idyllic island of Phuket.  

Step out of the villa’s double glass doors, promenade over the sweet, slatted bridge and slip gently into the sparkling infinity pool. From here it’s hard to tell where the pool ends and the magnificent Andaman Sea begins. Enjoy the novelty of the shaded lounger pods, ultra-padded for optimum comfort. Or opt for one of the classic loungers, elegantly lining the poolside. Take a refreshing drink across the garden to the open-air beach hut. Night or day, this is a romantic spot. Listen to the waves lapping at the shore, watch colorful sunsets, and lose yourself in the moment. For a relaxing evening, get cozy among the plentiful cushions of the family room, where you’ll find a satellite television. Or challenge your friends and family to a game of pool.

Cool off under the fan in the glass fronted lounge – flooded with light and home to a generous silver-tone couch. The second lounge will be your evening host, with its up-lit bar, party-friendly couch and platinum color drinks tables. Gather here before moving through to the superb dining area for your evening meal, presented by Tievoli’s wonderful chef. The banqueting table is accessorized by quirky sand colored chairs, playfully mimicking the golden beach to the front of the villa.

Thailand is a place for discovery, excitement and new experiences, but you’ll also want to return home refreshed and recharged. That’s where the villa’s five double bedrooms and a twin come in. All delivering a tranquil, comfortable retreat, expect to wake feeling utterly rested, and ready for a new day. Two of the bedrooms share a bathroom, while the other four each benefit from their own en-suite. Each room also has a flat screen television, perfect for winding down at the end of the night.

Traditional Siamese ‘junk’ boats will take you on a magical tour of Phang Nga Bay.

Ride under the red, wing-like sails, feel the sea-breeze in your hair and take in the spectacular, out-of-this-world scenery. Or venture out in a sea kayak to explore the ‘hongs’ of Phang Nga, small natural rooms that lie in some of the bay’s iconic limestone islands. Phuket airport is a 25 km from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Impeccable service, thoughtful amenities and creatively landscaped gardens take you a world away from the ordinary at Avasara Residence. What’s more, this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental is in a spectacular location on the grounds of the intimate Panacea Retreat Residence, overlooking tropical rainforests and the tranquil Gulf of Samui. Five suite-style bedrooms and spacious living areas let you bring friends and family together at this decadent private retreat.

Your holiday at Avasara Residence begins with an airport transfer and continues with chef and butler service and daily breakfast. You’ll want to spend most of your stay on the terrace by the gleaming infinity pool, which is surrounded by a row of lounge chairs and sunbeds and even a whimsical sculpture. Flip on the outdoor sound system and serve drinks at the swim-up bar, or try out local specialties on the barbecue and sit down at the al-fresco dining area. If you want to learn more about the local cuisine, take a Thai cooking lesson; if you’d rather relax, enjoy a massage or yoga session instead.

Glass-walled pavilions topped by peaked roofs make the most of the natural scenery and lush landscaping by renowned designer Bill Bensley. Along with the wood-paneled ceiling in the great room, fiber rugs and wicker sofas add natural texture, while poppy-red accent pillows and decorative sculptures fill the space with color and personality. The generous indoor dining area can seat up to ten guests, and the fully equipped, state-of-the-art kitchen also has a breakfast bar for more casual meals.

Each of the five bedrooms at Avasara Residence has en-suite bathroom; two of the suites open to the balcony as well. As in the great room, creamy tile floors, natural-fiber rugs and woven chairs create a neutral backdrop, while brilliant red throws and accent pillows add happy pops of color.

While it’s tempting to stay by the pool at Avasara Residence, it’s well worth making the 3 km drive to Bophut Beach, the 7 km drive to Chaweng or Maenam beaches, the 16 km drive to Lamai Beach or the 20 km drive to Nathon Beach, whether to wade in the shallows or relive your honeymoon with a romantic stroll. And from Fisherman’s Village, the Big Buddha Temple and the town of Chaweng to the Nathon and Koh Samui piers, the Koh Samui Rainforest, the Nathon Night Food Market and Namuang Safari Park, there’s plenty to see and do in the area. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 9 km trip from the villa to Samui Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Baan Puri villa in Koh Samui is one of those rare gems you will never forget. The beachfront grounds have been planted with over one hundred indigenous species of tropical plants chosen for their beauty and fragrances. At night, with the aroma of night scented flowers in the air, the grounds are magnificently lit and, together, create a chiaroscuro dreamscape.

The enormous one-hundred-foot-long blue-tiled infinity pool has permanent, sunken beds. The pool is also ideal for swimming laps, is chemical-free and uses modern ionizing technology and robotic cleaning. A large, partially covered terrace allows alfresco dining, entertaining or simply enjoying the view. Take advantage of the Sonos music system with Bose speakers as the barbecue grill sizzles in the comfort of the Sala. Come in from a sea kayaking excursion to freshly prepared delicacies made by your Thai chef!

In front of the entrance water feature stands an impressive two-story pavilion. The ground floor consists of a stunning open plan living area. A stylish kitchen with a dark slate-tiled floor and a center island features all the high quality appliances you would expect. At the other end, a magnificent chilled 400-bottle wine cellar serves as the backdrop to a ceiling mounted one-hundred-inch cinema screen. The lounge area is furnished with stylish, yet comfortable lemon colored sofas, ornaments and antiques such as a large oriental gong. The stately formal wooden dining table makes an ideal spot to share any special announcements.

Six finely appointed bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at Baan Puri. All bedrooms include ensuite bathrooms and a variety of individual perks. In one of the bathrooms, the various colored orchids hanging by the bath tub help induce truly relaxing tropical hydrotherapy and meditation.

Located in Lipa Noi, the beach at Baan Puri villa is one of the finest on the island. With soft white sand, good swimming conditions and outstanding views of the famous Five Islands, Ang Thong Marine Park and the mainland, Baan Puri is also perfectly positioned for enjoying Koh Samui’s legendary sunsets. Tropical resplendence awaits you at this fine boutique holiday destination!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Five separate levels of oceanfront views, joined by a series of marble staircases and elevators, complete this villa along Phuket’s exclusive and famous, “Millionaire’s Mile.” Carved into the rocks on the Kamala headland, the secluded spot, designed by Paris-based architect Arte Charpentier, inspires a tranquil escape. Red Mountain Golf Club, Surin Beach, and nightlife at Bangla Road are nearby.

Towering windows look out from every room onto the dense wilderness and dramatic seascape. A winding wooden staircase leads down the cliff past sculpted gardens to the rocks and coves below. Transparent balconies from all 6 bedrooms look out onto the Andaman Sea. Frolic in the ocean or swim a few laps in the refreshing, ice blue infinity pool that looks directly out onto the glimmering horizon. Sunbeds and loungers offer the perfect spot to dry off in the sun. Treat yourself to an in-house Thai massage located in the peaceful seaview sala.

Villa Minh is ideal for extended family vacations, weddings, events or just a fun trip away with your closest friends. The in-house chef will masterfully prepare all meals, either on the poolside barbecue or in the sleek steel kitchen. In the home cinema, lined with plush crimson walls, curl up on the oversized sectional couch and get lost in a favourite flick. A pool table with bar area makes the perfect recipe for some competitive fun. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take your Koh Samui holiday to the next level at Villa Zest in Lime Samui Estate. From its location just above the port town of Nathon, this hillside vacation rental commands spectacular views of the sea that even take in Angthong Marine Park and the Five Islands. A full staff elevates the experience to one of true tropical luxury for up to ten friends or family members.

Your stay begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a driver, chef, villa manager and housekeeper. Start each day with the included breakfast, then venture out on the provided sea kayaks or mountain bikes—or simply relax in the outdoor lounging and dining areas by the infinity pool. Kids will want to try out the outdoor zipline and trampoline, while grown-ups will appreciate the indoor fitness area, wine fridge and Wi-Fi access.

Fold back the villa’s glass walls to let the warm breezes flow through the open-plan great room at its heart. A sunken sofa is the perfect place to watch television or enjoy the views, and there’s room for ten in chic Lucite chairs around the dining table. Though chef service is included in your stay, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

Villa Zest at Lime Samui has five bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, and one bedroom with two queen plus two single beds. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and ceiling fans, and several have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as lounge areas, terrace access and jetted tubs.

Though its hillside setting feels quiet and restful, the villa is just a short drive from the bustling shops, restaurants and port of Nathon and the town’s beach, as well as the more laid-back Maenam Beach, and the tennis courts and golf course of Santiburi Resort. For a memorable half-day trip, head to Na Muang Safari Park or the impressive Big Buddha Temple.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Treat yourself to one of the largest infinity pools on Koh Samui—and an endless ocean panorama—at Samujana Twenty. The only oceanfront vacation rental on the Samujana estate, this luxury villa is just steps from the rocky shoreline and expanse of turquoise water. Invite up to ten friends and family for a warm-weather reunion, yoga retreat or even an intimate tropical wedding.

Your holiday at Samujana includes daily breakfast, airport transfers and the services of a villa manager, who can help arrange dinner by a private chef, massages, excursions and more. Spend your stay relaxing on the lounge chairs by the infinity pool, stretching out or practicing yoga in the home gym, or playing rousing rounds of lawn game or ping-pong. For a perfect end to the day, enjoy dinner from the poolside barbecue and finish with a little stargazing from the rooftop terrace.

Not only are the sunken living room, spacious dining room and fully equipped kitchen at Samujana Twenty open plan, they’re open to the ocean breezes, too. A built-in sectional and long Parsons dining table provide plenty of room for guests to gather, while wicker furniture and sandstone floors are chic, beachy touches. Snack or serve a buffet-style meal from the kitchen’s dramatically cantilevered breakfast bar.

All five of the villa’s bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and private terraces overlooking the ocean, so there are no worries about who has the best views. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, one with two twin beds, and one with a king bed and twin bed that’s perfect for parents traveling with children.

Both a family-friendly destination and a dreamy spot that tops many honeymooners’ lists, Koh Samui is lush and lovely. Samujana makes it easy to explore the island, with a Plai Laem location that’s just 5 minutes from casual Choeng Mon Beach and trendy Chaweng Beach, and 7 minutes from shopping and dining. Tee off at one of two nearby golf courses, encounter local flora and fauna in the rainforest or ask Samujana staff to help arrange a yacht charter, diving expedition or zipline tour.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on the secluded hillside between Chaweng and Lamai, 180 Samui offers unprecedented privacy even though it’s just a few minutes from beaches, golf, historic sites, and the city. With the name 180, you’d expect panoramic ocean views, and you’d be correct in your assumption. 180’s ocean view is incomparable. All five bedrooms have an incredible vista of the Gulf of Thailand, as does each common space, dining area, and even the gym. With its free-flowing atmosphere, 180 is perfect for hosting a special event like a wedding, engagement party, family reunion, or anything else worth celebrating in style.

180’s sleek and stylish exterior provides the perfect contrast to Thailand’s lush tropical hillside setting. Designed to promote an open-air ambiance, 180 has floor-to-ceiling openings uncovering nearly every inch of its ocean-facing exterior. At its center, the infinity-edge swimming pool provides a perfect place to relax and gaze upon the ocean view. The pool terrace opens on one side to the dining area, with seating for ten, and the ultra-modern kitchen. On the other side, the living room, with its billiards table, state of the art electronics, and its lounge area, which is sunken, so your sightline is level with the ocean view.

During your stay, you and your guests will appreciate the many living and dining areas, both indoors and outdoors that are spread across 180’s four levels. The villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, Smart TVs, an espresso machine, parking, and security. And, there’s a private chef available, with several optional packages to help cater your special event.

Nearby, in Chaweng, you’ll love exploring the white sandy beach, especially at low-tide when its two small islands and natural reef system are accessible by foot. For fine dining, spas, and golf, stick to the area around the coast, as it is mainly populated with luxury hotels and resorts. If you’re interested in bars, shopping, and exciting nightlife, head to the central downtown area of Chaweng, you won’t be disappointed.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A slice of paradise, beachside Cielo 3 is the epitome of style and luxury. Ideal for an intimate wedding or special celebration, the six-bedroom tropical retreat benefits from a daily maid service and the provision of a wonderful Thai chef.  An enchanting beach borders the villa’s landscaped garden, with soft white sands and turquoise waters.

The villa’s elongated saltwater pool provides an elegant focus to the tranquil sun deck. Swim with the sunrise for an invigorating start to your day, or enjoy a romantic moonlit dip before retiring to the beachside ‘sala’ with a cool drink. Hi-tech Cielo allows you to connect your iPod to the villa entertainment system. Create the perfect evening ambiance for a poolside meal or private party with Cielo’s mood lighting technology. Ideal for chilled out evenings, the family media room offers a staggering two thousand movies and on-screen Internet access for games and web surfing. If you love an active vacation, you will be thrilled to learn of Cielo’s collection of sea kayaks and five-a-side soccer pitch.

With cinematic views out to the runway pool, an open, contemporary living room is the striking centerpiece of Cielo’s interior. Enjoy laid-back evenings, reclining on the generous couches as you look out to sea or encourage your fellow guests as they take on a friendly game of pool. In common with the majority of the villa, the dining room enjoys the feeling of freedom gifted by the surrounding sliding-glass doors. A combination of pure white and crystal clear tableware is the modest counterpart to the exotic, delectable cuisine, served by your in-house chef.

Two ocean-view master suites reflect the calming coastal surroundings, with understated color schemes and tasteful, simple design. Sliding glass doors present heavenly views of the vibrant blues of the ocean and the villa’s emerald green lawn, dotted with palms. The guest bedrooms are equally as comfortable and elegant. Of the en-suite bathrooms, one is shared, and four private. Spa quality, all bathrooms feature refreshing rain-showers, while some enjoy luxuriant built-in bathtubs.

Phuket’s iconic Phang Nga Bay is nearby, with its towering limestone islands. Take a boat tour to witness the spectacular scenery close up and visit traditional fishing village Koh Panyee. Brimming with character, this extraordinary village is built over the water on stilts, and is fortified at the back by a terrific rock monolith.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beach lovers will adore this chic tropical retreat, intelligently arranged over three levels. A sensational location within a secure gated estate and a team of private staff make Essenza 4 the perfect venue for large family vacations, group events or romantic weddings. You’ll barely have time to slip into your flip flops before arriving on the soft warm sands of peaceful Sava Estate beach.

Lavender sunsets and spellbinding views from every room are just some of the attractions of this gorgeous beachfront villa. Outdoors, the glass-smooth infinity pool dissolves into the ocean at the end of a manicured lawn. While you stretch out poolside on a padded sun lounger and indulge in a good book or just catch up on your thoughts, ask your Thai chef to create a culinary feast for you and your fellow guests. Continental breakfasts and shaded lunches can be enjoyed under the canopy of the outdoor dining pavilion, or perhaps you’d prefer a barbecue under the stars?

Indoors, the expansive central lounge area draws in cooling sea breezes front and back, and a spacious family room sits to the left of the entrance. Soak up the views from the formal dining table or settle deep in the cushions of one of the plush sofas and let your eyes rest on the horizon…or the television screen. A cutting edge lighting and entertainment system allows you to set the mood in each room and built-in speakers mean you can take your tunes anywhere.

The six air-conditioned bedrooms are a welcome retreat at the end of the day. Huge sliding glass doors have been artfully designed to bring the outside in, so you can drift off to sleep and awake refreshed, accompanied by the swish of the waves lapping on the shore. Four of the bedrooms are en-suite, while two share a deluxe bathroom. If you dream of looking out to sea while you bathe in a deep tub, you’ve found your ideal vacation home.

It’s hard to imagine, but if you tire of the beautiful beach in your backyard, there are plenty of other activities to keep you occupied. Massages and spa treatments can be arranged in your villa and excursions can be planned, all for an extra cost. Alternatively, jump in your rental vehicle, safely parked in the garage, and head to the lively towns of Phuket, Khaolak and Takuapa, all within an hour’s drive. Phuket International Airport is just 27 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking Coral Cove, this private luxury rental is centrally located in the Samujana estate. Great for a vacation with the whole family, friends, or maybe even a small corporate getaway, there’s plenty of space at Ten for hosting. It’s also an ideal home base for a golf trip, with the championship caliber Bohput Hills Golf Club just a few minutes away.

The sheer number of amenities at Ten is what truly sets it apart from the competition. There is so much space, both inside and out for socializing, relaxing, and dining. Sun beds and loungers around the infinity pool make the balcony an easy place to find peace and tranquility. Inside you’ll find a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, an amazing open concept lounge area, and formal dining for ten. There’s plenty of space for alfresco dining as well. Daily housekeeping will make your stay even easier.

Modern contemporary architecture and designer furnishings give Ten an elegant simplicity, while accents of stained wood and stone integrate elements of the local environment into this very sophisticated design. Open concept social areas flow seamlessly into each other, making a perfect venue for hosting. Local artwork and splashes of bright colors keep the inside interesting, while floor to ceiling windows invite the vibrant blues and greens of the natural surroundings to be ever present throughout the entire villa.

All five bedrooms are beautiful and unique, and not one of them is lacking any features. King sized beds, ensuite bathrooms with showers, tubs, bidets, safes, lounges, and private access to the terraces make each bedroom feel like a master bedroom.

Nearby, you’ll find boutique shops, fine dining, and an exciting nightlife on Main Street. If you’d like to do some exploring, the Ko Samui Rainforest and several pristine sandy beaches are located minutes away from Ten as well. With plenty of exciting attractions, Samujana is the perfect spot to plan your Thai vacation.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Blurring indoor and outdoor spaces in the most spectacular fashion, this private luxury villa is the perfect atmosphere for enjoying Thailand’s beautiful ocean environment. Located on the hillside of the Samujana Estate, Villa Seventeen boasts some of the areas most spectacular ocean views.

Incorporating the natural rock face of the hillside into its living spaces, this sleek villa is not only comfortable and luxurious, it’s also an architectural triumph. Nature elements like wood, stone, and lush gardens are used throughout interior and exterior spaces, both as decoration and building materials. The open concept design, and merging of spaces, ensure an ease of flow for sunlight and fresh ocean breeze. Minimalistic designer furniture, a neutral colour scheme, and numerous windows and openings allow the vibrant hues of nature to capture guests attention.

The kitchen comes equipped with state of the art appliances, a breakfast bar, and formal dining for eight. The lounge, study, and home theatre room are great places to relax after a day on the beach. An iPod docking station, surround sound system, barbecue, and alfresco dining area make Seventeen an ideal spot for hosting family and friends. And, the saltwater infinity pool is perfect for a refreshing morning dip, after an exciting night under the stars. Also included with the rental is daily housekeeping, airport transfer, and breakfast.

King beds, ensuites with showers, bathtubs, and bidets, lounge areas, and private access to the terrace are all features of Seventeen’s four private bedrooms. Decorated in the same minimalistic style as the living room, the bedrooms and ensuites are sophisticated and elegant, while remaining cozy and inviting.

Thailand is rich with beautiful dynamic landscapes. Beaches, rain forest, country clubs, and golf courses are all great ways to take in the areas natural features, and they are all within a few miles of the Estate. If you’d like a trip to town, shopping, restaurants, and nightlife are all readily available on Koh Samui’s Main Street.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Baan Paradise is an extraordinary oceanfront villa in Lamai on the Thai island of Koh Samui. Situated on the island's southeast shore, the villa borders a beautiful, white-sand beach for relaxation and dining, and is just minutes from Lamai Beach and some of the finest golf courses in Thailand. With spectacular ocean views, superb outdoor and indoor living areas, and five deluxe bedroom suites (all with ensuite bathrooms and terrace access), this luxury vacation rental is ideal for multiple couples, families, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.

Surrounded by lush gardens and towering palm trees, the villa features multiple relaxation areas for savoring the exquisite South Pacific sun. Enjoy enchanting hours in the beautiful infinite swimming pool, relaxing on elegant loungers beneath parasols, and sipping cool refreshments in the sunny lounge. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, mix delicious cocktails at the wet bar, play a game of pool, and cook a delicious barbeque lunch. The outstanding living-and-dining pavilion features a gorgeous table and sumptuous lounge areas just steps from the shore—a perfect place to dine or merely luxuriate in the ocean air.

Large glass doors open from the pool terrace to the villa's interior, creating a wonderfully seamless space for evening entertainment. The lovely kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and ample cocktail bar, and gracefully serves the gorgeous dining table for ten. The lounge with TV and surround sound is perfect for relaxing nights together, while the well-appointed fitness room offers a refreshing start to the day. Throughout the villa, the exquisite décor and design inspire a tranquil vitality.

The villa features five enchanting bedroom suites: a master suite with king bed, and four guest suites with queen beds. All have private lounges, TVs, safes, direct access to furnished private terraces, and ensuite bathrooms with dual vanity and stand-alone rain shower. The master bathroom features a jetted tub as well.

At Baan Paradise, you'll enjoy a supreme balance of seclusion and convenience. You're about three kilometers from Lamai Beach, and an easy drive to Nikki Beach and Thongyang Beach. Golfers are just ten kilometers from Royal Samui Golf Club and an easy drive to Bophut Hills Golf Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched majestically atop the private Samsara peninsula, Villa Benyasiri commands panoramic crow’s nest views over Patong Harbor and the glorious Andaman Sea. Villa Benyasiri is a luxurious modern villa featuring expansive living and entertainment areas. The villa’s upper living and dining rooms open directly onto dramatic wraparound outdoor decks.

Relaxed outdoor dining, barbecue, and sunning areas complement a stunning 14 meter infinity-edge pool which appears to stretch far into the horizon. The pool incorporates a shallow area for children and glass panels along its bottom which look into the room below. A small path from the pool deck leads to a large open-air detached traditional Thai Sala, perfect for soaking in Phuket’s classic sunsets. Inside the villa, furnishings are comfortable and tasteful throughout – ideal for families and casual entertaining. Located on the first floor is a home theatre equipped with a 96” projection screen, DVD, and games console.

The ambience inside the villa is light, airy and traditionally Thai. From the many artifacts throughout, through to the wonderful use of wood and splashes of color, you’ll feel relaxed and at home on your vacation. You will have a live-in Thai cook included in your stay, so you don’t need to venture into the kitchen if you don’t want to. The living area offers a serene outlook over the sea to the colorful mountains beyond.

A handful of en-suite, air conditioned bedrooms offer an array of comfortable spaces for a deep relaxing slumber at the end of every day. The sofa in the media room can be converted into a full size bed if you need the extra accommodation. Benyasiri Samsara caters for a maximum of 12 guests and no more than eight children are permitted. Two of the bedrooms have an extra touch of splendor with access to private terraces for those late romantic nightcaps under the stars.

If you can bear to tear yourself away from this incredibly enchanting home for a day trip then there’s a whole world of excitement right on your doorstep in Phuket. For a more relaxing time, you can take a leisurely meander down to one of the nearby beaches (around 10-20 minutes’ walk) and read a book in a shaded spot or splash around in the wonderful warm ocean for a while. Whatever you get up to, you’ll love returning to Benyasiri at the end of your day.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

feature.p: Benyasiri is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

ul.li: The Samara Estate is patrolled 24 hours per day by a 3 man security team
The Estate has a backup generator which kicks in automatically in case of a local power outage
On-site villa manager’s office has a fax machine available to all guests

listing.listing_description:
A rising star of a villa overlooking the sunset coast of Koh Samui, Villa Spice at Lime Samui elevates the beach holiday in Thailand with stylish contemporary interiors, personalized service and thoughtful design. From your private hillside perch at this luxury vacation rental, enjoy resort-worthy amenities, five suite-style bedrooms and breathtaking views, whether as a family, with a group of friends or on an ultra-chic honeymoon.

Each day at Villa Spice at Lime Samui begins with a daily breakfast. From there, head to the fitness room to fit in a workout, lie down in the massage room or stretch out on one of the lounge chairs lined up by the infinity pool overlooking the Gulf of Thailand. The barbecue is the perfect place to prep dinner before you sit down at the al-fresco dining area; after the meal you can enjoy a favorite in the home theatre. Your stay includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, villa manager and one roundtrip airport transfer.

Laid out over a series of terraced levels to maximize the sea views and take advantage of the hillside setting, the villa is open and airy—you’re never far from a window or a glass wall that folds back to let in the warm breeze. When you’re not outside, you’ll want to enjoy the expansive great room, which features a sunken lounge area with cushions the hue of the ocean outside, a dining area with mod white chairs and a fully equipped kitchen with a convenient breakfast bar.

Each of the five bedrooms at Villa Spice at Lime Samui has an en-suite bathroom and views of the Gulf of Thailand; four have king beds and the fifth bedroom has has two queen beds and two single beds. Rain showers are a spa-worthy indulgence in each of the bathrooms, and direct access to the terrace from the bedrooms means you can wake up to watch the sun shimmering on the water and feel the warmth on your face.

Though the villa feels totally secluded and private, it’s just under 6 km to the shops and restaurants in Nathon and about 5 km to Nathon Beach. You’ll also find both Lipa Noi Beach and Bophut Beach within a 12 km drive, and golfers won’t want to miss Santiburi Samui Golf and Country Club, 7 km away. At the end of your stay, make your connection via Samui Airport, a 19 km drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Taste the peace of the peaceful southern coast of Koh Samui at this plush cliffside villa. From this home’s raised location, guests can take in a fabulous view of the blue Tean Island straits in the distance. Airy interiors and premium luxury typify this home, with forest-view balconies and an infinity pool promising next-level comfort, while secluded beaches and charming towns all lie close by.

Guests are close enough to the tropical coastline to be able to take in the sail boats and white waves that puncture the stunning blue sea, with the viewpoint balcony a great spot to sip coffee in the fresh mornings while sinking into rich cushions. Freely wander the green lawns and take up a poolside recliner, with the vine-wrapped cliff behind and the lush forest stretching in front. The distinct white color scheme of this villa emphasizes the impressive ceilings and spacious, well-furnished interior, with the soaring, traditional Thai ceilings helping to keep the space as cool as possible .

In contrast to northern Koh Samui, this villa is located on the quieter southern coast. From the villa, guests have good access to sandy and sunny local beaches, or can make a short drive to premiere seaside spas and resorts such as Nikki Beach. The uniquely rich cultural heritage of this Thai island is represented via local sites like the ornate coastal tower of Laem Sor Pagoda. The wild beauty of the island can be intimately experienced at the picturesque Namuang waterfall just to the north.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take yourself away to an idyllic setting at Ban Suriya. This luxury Koh Samui vacation rental, whose name translates to “sunshine house,” sits amid the palms of a former coconut plantation overlooking the white sands of Lipa Noi beach. Invite up to twelve friends or family members to spend a week or two being pampered by the villa’s attentive staff.

Your holiday at Ban Suriya begins with an airport transfer for up to ten guests and includes the services of a villa manager, chef, housekeeper and nighttime security staff. Spend your days splashing in the swimming pool and plunge pool, lounging under the palms, enjoying a book or a massage in a treehouse with a massage area and sundeck, or trying local specialties from the barbecue. Other amenities range from an indoor spa and exercise room to a games room and library.

High ceilings and fold-away walls let the tropical breezes into the villa’s open-concept rooms. Crisp white and warm wood are carried through the living areas and dining room for a contemporary look, while huge windows showcase views of the lush surroundings. While daily continental breakfast and chef service are included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

Ban Suriya has five bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with lounge and massage areas, and one bedroom with two twin beds. The king bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, while the twin bedroom shares access to a hall bathroom; all six bedrooms have air conditioning.

With the gorgeous beach of Lipa Noi just steps away and popular Nikki Beach just a short drive from the villa, the hardest part of your stay may be deciding where to spend the day. If you’ve had your fill of sun and sand, spend an afternoon at the nearby Samui Cultural Center or Wat Samut Tharam temple.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Under the azure sky of the Gulf of Thailand, this beachside villa offers radiant glamor alongside contemporary, inventive design. Rich interiors and sun-splashed terraces ensure that guests can relax indoors amidst regal decor, or soak up the Thai sunshine from the poolside recliners. After a walk on the beach, visit Koh Samui's famous Big Buddha, plus myriad close-by dining and shopping options.

The towering wooden reaches and inventive interior of this villa’s soaring living room will slowly glow with the light of the new day; a perfect spot from which to plan your outings on this famous holiday island. After an energetic session in the private gym, plunge into the blue-tiled embrace of the exterior pool, before drying off with a book or device in the cushioned and luxuriously-shaded gazebo. Finely detailed stonework enriches the villa’s welcoming bathrooms, while the fresh breeze from the Gulf is best experienced from the intricate-decorated railings of the upper balconies.

From Angthong Villa, guests have access to a dizzying range of outing options. Being located with direct access to the sandy expanse of Bophut Beach, guests can simply start walking, and quickly experience the sunlit glory of this storied stretch of Thai coast. Visit an abundance of extravagant, awe-inspiring Buddhist and Hindu temples, or experience the richness of Thai cuisine at the renowned restaurants and tucked-away eateries that pack this part of the island. Cruise outings, excursions to the forested interior, and even sea kayaking from the beach are all great options.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Jaliza is an exquisite luxury villa overlooking the Gulf of Thailand near Chaweng, on the world-renowned resort island of Koh Samui. With beautiful ocean views and gorgeous design blending contemporary lines, sumptuous comfort, and Buddhist-inspired décor, this six-bedroom vacation rental gives you a private sanctuary within easy reach of the island's beaches, golf courses, and precious rainforests.

Elegantly nestled amid lush flora on a hilltop overlooking the sea, the villa features a lovely infinite swimming pool and spectacular vistas of the shoreline, rainforests, coconut groves, and turquoise waters. You'll relax on elegant sun loungers on the pool deck, and withdraw into the lovely, traditional pavilion with sala lounge for meditation and afternoon tea. In the evening, relish a sunset dinner together at the alfresco dining table, as the gurgling fountain and impressive stone Buddha inspire openness and presence.

From the pool terrace, wall-length glass doors open to the villa's cool interior. Here, the sumptuous, ocean-view lounge with large sectional couch and mounted flat screen TV is ideal for evenings and nights together with friends and family. The open plan interior also includes an elegant dining table and a kitchen fully equipped with chef grade appliances, as well as a breakfast bar and large glass doors opening to the terrace. The interior area is luminous throughout, with beautiful wooden doors and original paintings on the walls. Downstairs, there is an ocean-view game room with pool table.

The upstairs landing welcomes you with a traditional vaulted ceiling of lovely wood and gallery-worthy sculptures and paintings. The six bedrooms include four with king size beds, one with two twin beds, and one with two double size beds. Five of the six bedrooms include balconies with ocean views, and all of the rooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master bedroom is particularly ample and stunning, with vaulted wooden ceilings, a lounge area, a classic vanity, wide ocean views, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub.

At Villa Jaliza, you're perfectly placed for exploring the island's towns, natural beauty, and Buddhist heritage. Fisherman's Village and the town of Chaweng are both just minutes away by car, while Chaweng Beach, Chaweng Noi Beach, and Bophut Beach are also nearby—perfect for a sunset swim.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Glass-walled rooms encircle the flowering tree in the tranquil courtyard of this contemporary residence in Cherngtalay. Its curving rooflines evoke the classic architecture of Thailand, but oversized faces peer out from modern paintings in its gallery-like rooms. Watch the breeze ruffle the surface of the pond beyond the pool and drive 3 minutes to join honeymooners and families on Laguna Beach.

A covered alfresco living area leads the way to a sunny terrace with alfresco dining for 8, plenty of loungers, and an infinity pool that seems to spill into the pond just beyond the villa. After a day at the beach, the spa, or on the golf course, pour a glass from the wine fridge and let the curved smart TV and Wi-Fi entertain.

Fold-away glass walls are all that separates the great room from the outdoor living areas of this vacation rental. Two sitting areas stretch out beneath a vaulted wooden ceiling, and the adjacent dining area seats 8. If you’ve brought the whole family on holiday, let kids perch at the breakfast bar for a snack while you prep dinner in the sleek fully equipped kitchen. 

Each of the 4 bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, private ensuite bathroom, and access to the terrace or gardens. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are also air conditioned.

Guests of the villa are welcome at the Banyan Tree resort amenities. Take the resort shuttle to visit the pool, book a massage at the spa, or reserve a tee time at Laguna Phuket Golf Club. Beyond the resort, it’s less than a 5-minute drive to the white sands and calm waters of Laguna and Bang Tao beaches, lined with casual bars and restaurants, and you’re close to some of the best shopping and clubs in the Thalang area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
